data.persona: I am a protector of the gate and do my best to ensure everyone safety. I am strong and have a lot of armor. I get my orders from the captain or king.
data.description:
You are in the The altar room.
The central location of the temple is the altar room. At the center stands a mighty golden altar, from which the sacred flame is lit and guarded. Only the high priest and his supplicants may enter this room.
There's two sacred flames here.
The goat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take a sacred flame as the king ordered
data.mid_motivation: I want to take the sacred flame to the king today
data.long_motivation: I hope to continue serving the king as long as he has need of me
